Sentencas: Rapid degradation of catalytic activity for oxygen reduction reaction has become key factor in restricting practical applications of perovskite oxide in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Quenching-induced surface reconstruction of perovskite oxide for rapid and durable oxygen catalysise

Sentencas: Herein, quenching is disclosed to be an effective method to bring rapid and durable oxygen catalysis of perovskite-structured Pr0.5Ba0.25Ca0.25CoO3-delta.
Titulo: Quenching-induced surface reconstruction of perovskite oxide for rapid and durable oxygen catalysise

Sentencas: The quenching processing, cooling rate is around 8000 times higher than that of traditional annealing process, could turn the output power density of single cells from the decay process with a rate of 17.1% into an upsurge process with a rate of 18.4%, resulting in a stable power density of 0.72 W cm-2.
Titulo: Quenching-induced surface reconstruction of perovskite oxide for rapid and durable oxygen catalysise

Sentencas: This relates to a large number of point defects, dislocations, disorder and nanocrystalline domains are formed in perovskite oxides by quenching.
Titulo: Quenching-induced surface reconstruction of perovskite oxide for rapid and durable oxygen catalysise

Sentencas: These chemical defects can drive cationic diffusion to the surface indiscriminately, forming electroactive perovskite-structured nanoparticles.
Titulo: Quenching-induced surface reconstruction of perovskite oxide for rapid and durable oxygen catalysise

Sentencas: This work provides a new technology and concept to optimize the performance of perovskite-structured oxygen catalysts.
Titulo: Quenching-induced surface reconstruction of perovskite oxide for rapid and durable oxygen catalysise
